FLAG CODE http://astro-informatics.github.io/flag Fast Fourier-Laguerre transform on the ball Exact spherical Bessel and Fourier-Bessel transforms ---------------------------------------------------------------- DESCRIPTION The FLAG code provides functionality to perform fast and exact Fourier-Laguerre and Fourier-Bessel transforms on the ball. VERSION Release 1.0b1, November 2012 AUTHORS B. Leistedt (www.ixkael.com/blog) J. D. McEwen (www.jasonmcewen.org) REFERENCES B. Leistedt and J. D. McEwen, Exact Wavelets on the Ball, IEEE Trans. Sig. Proc., 60, 2012 (arXiv:1205.0792) J. D. McEwen and Y. Wiaux, A novel sampling theorem on the sphere, IEEE Trans. Sig. Proc., 59, 2011 (arXiv:1110.6298). DOCUMENTATION See doc/index.html INSTALLATION See documentation REQUIREMENTS SSHT (http://www.spinsht.org) FFTW (http://www.fftw.org) DOWNLOAD http://www.jasonmcewen.org/codes.html SUPPORT Please email the authors. NOTE The package is in beta and is still under development. Please report problems/bugs by email to: boris.leistedt@gmail.com LICENSE FLAG package to perform fast wavelet transform on the sphere
